snippet: Light early-morning snow showers and an ominous forecast prompted the Twins to postpone Sunday’s game, and this might not be the last postponement for the Mets on this trip, either.
abstract: Light early-morning snow showers and an ominous forecast prompted the Twins to postpone Sunday’s game, and this might not be the last postponement for the Mets on this trip, either.

headline.main: More Snow Could Be in Mets' Future
